Property.name: University

Method.name: ConvertToProxyObject
Method.Implementation: set proxy = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set proxy.id = ..%Id() //set proxy.birthday = $ZDATE(..BirthDay, 3) set proxy.firstname = ..FirstName.Value set proxy.lastname = ..LastName.Value set proxy.middlename = ..MiddleName.Value set proxy.phone = ..Phone set proxy.email = ..Email set proxy.skype = ..Skype set proxy.agree = ..MailAgree set proxy.cache = ..CacheScience set proxy.ensemble = ..EnsembleScience set proxy.deepsee = ..DeepSeeScience set proxy.tet = ..TET set proxy.pet = ..Pet.ConvertToProxyObject(idPET) set proxy.resume = ..Resume set proxy.city = ..City.ConvertToProxyObject() set proxy.university = ..University.ConvertToProxyObject() set proxy.eng=..engScience.ConvertToProxyObject(idEng) quit proxy

UDLText.name: T
